title: Before You Can Scale You Have To Execute, With Ken Villazor, Flower One Holdings
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Ken Villazor is President and CEO of Flower One Holdings, a publicly traded cannabis company. Ken joins Rena Sherbill to discuss what differentiates Flower One from other U.S. focused cannabis companies, what other states and countries can learn from Nevada's successful regulatory program, the decision to focus on price and yield, and why - if anything - the market's only getting stronger. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
